ADD_LIBRARY (FACESDK_LIBRARY SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES (FACESDK_LIBRARY PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION ${FACESDK_ROOT}/bin/linux_x86_64/libfsdk.so INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${FACESDK_ROOT}/include/C)
